review:
*** ******** *** **** *** **** ******* * **** ***** This is second time almost after 13yrs I had to visit due to my bad tooth. As always he suggested the right and best treatment. He explained clearly why and what he was doing which helped me. The RCT Specialist Dr. Hemant as well was really good.

The way both doctors treated, the best is I didn't experience any kind of trouble while undergoing process or after that. Absolutely I would recommend Esthetix anyday for any Kind of Dental solution.

Thanks so much to Dr. Sreedhar & Dr. Hemant
